mapper.update: update friend set friend_accept='Y' where member_code=#{memberCode} and member_Id=#{memberId}
update friend set friend_accept='D' where member_code=#{memberCode} and member_Id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select F.*,P.profile_img_re from friend F left join member_profile P on F.friend_code = P.member_code where F.member_code = #{memberCode}
